rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective. 'mild respiratory illness symptoms' is mitigating.
statement_text: An investigation into the still unexplained human H5N1 bird flu infection in Missouri has turned up four additional health care workers who developed mild respiratory illness symptoms after caring for the patient in hospital in August, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported on Friday. It [infection status] is not clear if any of these people [four additional health care workers] were actually infected with H5N1; they [four additional health care workers] were not tested at the time when they were ill.
